name: Myorem
overview: The final part of the "Saga of a Spy: The Rick Hanson Trilogy", "Rick Hanson" and "Project Theseus" being parts 1 and 2. Myorem is built around the novel theme that all the action is taking place in flashback, and should your concentration waver for a moment then you will return to a very unhappy present situation. Whether accidental or by design, the game's title is an anagram of Memory.
